Text: false positive my butt. this is a rootkit known as serefef, a dangerous virus that replaces critical system files until an inevitable crash. very difficult to get rid of. not impossible though. better luck next time, jerk.
Plz, get educated be4 you comment...

please get a life and/or girlfriend. only losers sit around giggling to themselves because they put a virus on someone's computer. and i am quite educated in the matter. kinda had to do my research considering you infected my computer with your shit torrent. it started deleting my files and i had to reinstall my op system because while i could get at the system files being corrupted i could not get at the infection itself. pain in the ass, but like i said difficult but not impossible to get rid of.
